```{r custom func,echo=F}
library(htmltools)
thumbnail <- function(title, img, href, caption = TRUE) {
  div(class = "col-sm-4",
      a(class = "thumbnail", title = title, href = href,
        img(src = img),
        div(class = if (caption) "caption",
            if (caption) title)
      )
  )
}
```

```{r, echo=F}
thumbnail("First Post","thoughts_images/html.png","https://matthewlavallee.github.io/simple_demo.html")
thumbnail("Second Post","thoughts_images/html.png","https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple")
```
